definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Collectors were immediately drawn to the strength of fundamental classical technique that Shang Ding possessed.
sentences.chinese: 收藏家們立刻爲尚丁的基礎性古典技巧所吸引。

sentences.english: Any stamp collector would like to own the one-cent British Guiana .
sentences.chinese: 任何郵票收藏家想以自己的一個仙英屬圭亞那。

sentences.english: A record collector played some goodies for me on his record player.
sentences.chinese: 一位收藏家用他的唱機爲我播放了幾張好東西。

sentences.english: Golden cowrie shells are among the hardest shells to find and are prized by collectors.
sentences.chinese: 黃金寶螺的貝殼極難找到，它們爲收藏家所推崇。

sentences.english: In a front-page headline it said he was "a collector and a patriot".
sentences.chinese: 頭版的一個標題稱他是“收藏家和愛國者”。

sentences.english: Lord Hertford’s reputation as a discerning, major collector was secured.
sentences.chinese: 赫特福德勳爵獨具慧眼的大收藏家聲譽從此開始確立。

sentences.english: The Wayfarer Rare Prints is a must have for any collector or enthusiast.
sentences.chinese: 該旅行者珍稀版畫是一個必須有任何收藏家或愛好者。

sentences.english: After eating the pancakes, overflowing with happiness, the old collector said he would take a nap.
sentences.chinese: 老收藏家喫過烤薄餅，滿心歡喜，又想打個盹。

sentences.english: New England attics are happy hunting grounds for antique collectors.
sentences.chinese: 新英格蘭的閣樓是古董收藏家的樂園。

sentences.english: Herb is a collector of vintage cars .
sentences.chinese: 赫柏是古董車的收藏家。

sentences.english: Those who never have to move house become indiscriminate collectors of what can only be described as clutter.
sentences.chinese: 那些從來不必搬家的人們成了一種無所不容的收藏家。

sentences.english: Early editions of Shakepeare's plays are much sought after by collectors.
sentences.chinese: 收藏家們非常珍惜莎士比亞的早期版本。

sentences.english: He enjoyed a great reputation as an antiquarian.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個享有盛名的古玩收藏家。

sentences.english: These old stamps are eagerly coveted by collectors.
sentences.chinese: 收藏家們對這些舊郵票都垂涎三尺。

sentences.english: His paintings have become collectors' items.
sentences.chinese: 他的畫已成爲收藏家爭購的對象。

sentences.english: The vase turned out to be a collector's item.
sentences.chinese: 這個花瓶成爲收藏家所爭取的珍物。

definition: authentic (painting or calligraphy)/genuine work (of famous artist)
